website_summaries.verdict: Easiest way to spread calm in a room or to calm yourself. Just spray and smell.
pros: The ultimate time saver — premixed with water so there’s no need to fill a diffuser with water
Doesn’t leave furniture or clothes wet
Oil enthusiasts note the unique addition of chamomile to the recipe
cons: Some wish that the smell lingered longer

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced and smells bad
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the lavender and chamomile - does not smell as it should. Cheap packaging, totally overpriced. Might as well put some drops of lavender essential oil in a spray bottle with some water and call it a day!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping like a baby!
customer_reviews.text: Love this spray! I spray it on my pillow and sheets before I lay down and it has such a light but great scent! Calms and soothes me so I can fall asleep.
customer_reviews.author: CandeceV

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Aromatherapy Mist
customer_reviews.text: Great product to purchase. The scent is very relaxing but not overpowering. Great room deodorizer and mist for linen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Even better than what you would expect. Expectations far exceeded
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: The smell is absolutely amazing! When I first recieved it
customer_reviews.text: The smell is absolutely amazing! When I first recieved it, I sprayed a little bit on my pillow and it lasted for about 4 days! I seriously can't describe how soothing the smell is!
customer_reviews.author: Sara AlKadeeb

customer_reviews.title: Childhood Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Let me preface this by saying that I know everyone processes and relates to smells differently, so not everyone may agree with me, but bear with me here. For me, the smell of this spray reminds me of the scent of the dolls/toys I used to play with as a little girl...and I ABSOLUTELY love it! There is just something so calming about this long-forgotten scent of childhood. I personally like it better as a linen/pillow mist, but it's in no way bad as a body spray either. Just this morning I tried misting my scarf and I was in heaven as I walked to work. This is amazing and I can't wait to try out the other scents!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: Lovely but smell does not linger AT ALL!
customer_reviews.text: Got the “energy boost” variety. SMELLS AMAAAZING. But smell does not stick around past like 20 seconds, even sprayed on upholstery or hair. Disappointed because it really does have a heavenly and uplifting fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: belle flâneuse

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sleep aid and natural pain reliever!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works! I spray it on my pillow, sheets, and myself before going to bed. It prevents restless legs, calms the nervous system, and helps me drift off to sleep. After a few weeks of use, I've discovered this miracle mist also relieves pain naturally. When I have a headache, I spray some into my palm and massage into my temples right on the pulse points. It definitely eases the pain. When I have a backache, achy muscles, or arthritis pain in my hands, I spray the affected area and massage into the skin. It begins to ease the pain almost immediately. This is a wonderful product with many uses!
customer_reviews.author: S.W., NC

customer_reviews.title: Not great smell, wrong label
customer_reviews.text: Confusing... I bought the “Instant stress relief” and on my bottle it is written “Patchouli and bergamot” but there is no bergamot in the ingredients. Smells good though. I also got the “Mist your mood” (lavender and camomille) and the label is the one for “Instant stress relief”. I do not like the scent of this one, it smells like washing powder. The spray is great, fine and even, and we can easily open the bottle and add any essential desired but the bottle is plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Lison

customer_reviews.title: Better than Ambien?
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Ambien for several years and my doctors/government are regulating the use of such products in the marketplace. So, I started my search for a natural alternative. Since I am on medical leave for a hip replacement surgery, I sprayed a little on my pillow and nightgown as soon as the package arrived; and within several minutes I got really, really drowsy. For the 1st time in YEARS, I did not need my Ambien after my very 1st use of this product. Thank you for supplying such an effective product.
customer_reviews.author: Aundria Glover

customer_reviews.title: Feel super good
customer_reviews.text: My first impression of this product is excellent. The scent is not overwhelming. It is very refreshing a. Once the aroma hit my sinus I can feel its effect in my tongue (I'm sensitive enough to feel that way, I think). This tells me the product has excellent quality. Customer service is readily available and informative about the usage tip. I like all natural ingredients. Packaging is nice and clean. I will try the other line of products from this company.
customer_reviews.author: sm

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer :)
customer_reviews.text: As a freshman about to start college with a family of pets I wanted something to help calm down my anxiety and stress levels by giving my room a nice soothing flow. I've tried countless products, air scense being one of my favorites and I am very pleased to have found this! This smell is just right and is pleasant to have linger in the air. I would highly recommend using! Great customer service and arrived so fast! I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Nakiya

customer_reviews.title: Soothing and nice smelling spray for calming and sleep!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 10 year old grandson that has been having difficulty falling asleep, even after shutting off electronics way before time for bed and just reading, etc. He really likes the scent as it isn’t overpowering and it seems to be helping him relax and go to sleep. So his younger brother wanted some too and I purchased two more - one for him and one for me!
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: New formula sucks.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bergamot and patchouli scent. Some of the other negative reviews are correct - I bought my first bottle with the old packaging months ago and loved it. I bought my second bottle with the new (albeit more beautiful) packaging. But but but it smells TERRIBLE. Nothing like bergamot and nothing like patchouli. I opened up the bottle and it looked different from the old formula which was sort of cloudy and watery. The new formula Is yellow, thick and oily. I threw it out. Won’t be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: alice

customer_reviews.title: the scent has been watered down
customer_reviews.text: The scent has been watered down! I have purchased this spray many times in the past but will be doing so no longer. It used to be a staple in our nightly routine to spray our pillows before bed. Now, the scent dissipates so rapidly I’ve started making my own which is much cheaper anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Baum

customer_reviews.title: Stress reliever.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my college son who has been experiencing stress and anxiety for various reasons. He used it a few days after receiving it and said that it really worked to calm him down. I was so happy to hear he found relief. The seller also provided tips of different ways it can be used which I shared with him.
customer_reviews.author: D E

customer_reviews.title: Buy at least 2!
customer_reviews.text: Update: I still love this stuff. Even more so, this company is INCREDIBLE. They are so involved with their customers. Even if I did find a spray I liked better (not possible) I would still purchase from Asutra. Everyone loves the stuff. It will go in all of my gift baskets from now on! THIS STUFF IS AWESOME> So awesome, that someone actually stole it from me... no joke. Not sure who it was as we had a lot of guests, but someone took the liberty of lifting my calming mist spray. Buttheads. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: helps kill nasty smells
customer_reviews.text: I actually got this for a few reasons. 1. help the baby sleep 2. kill the odor in the diaper bag 3. thought it'd try it as a toner as well. Seems to work for all three. Works better than anything else I've tried to help get rid of bad smells. You have to like the smell of tea tree oil though because that's what it smells like. I put it on my skin for kicks and giggles and it's actually pretty calming and nice at the end of the night. win/win/win. Give it a try
customer_reviews.author: R. Zier

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't smell that great
customer_reviews.text: I was super disappointed when Bath & Body Works discontinued their lavender and chamomile pillow sleep spray. I was trying to find a replacement that had both lavender and chamomile and saw this product had a lot of good reviews. Unfortunately, I don't smell any lavender and the scent isn't relaxing to me. I'm not a fan of the scent. I'll have to keep searching for something else now...
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Scent is relaxing but doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately as much as it smells great and they got the scent right the scent doesn’t last long at all! I have a oil aromatherapy based perfume I purchased while in Australia and was trying to find a replacement here in the US. This unsuccessfully replaced it! I wouldn’t purchased this unless you want to just smell it for a few minutes! Very sad
customer_reviews.author: Marnoosh

customer_reviews.title: Shame the formula was changed!!!
customer_reviews.text: WON'T buy again! You not only changed the label, you changed the scent formula. Which truly saddens and upsets me! There was oil all over inside the package and the wrapping which I would NOT have minded had it been your original scent mixture!! I use this nightly in my bedroom and my 7 yr old's( whom needs it more than I do). GO BACK TO THE OLD FRAGRANCE FORMULA!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Whisper

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly lavender goodness!
customer_reviews.text: Lavender has been my signature scent for years. Lately though I've been having a hard time finding a body spry that actually smelled like lavender. Thankfully I found this product! The scent of this lavender and chamomile spray is incredible! It really does relax me and the scent lasts a long time. My husband is actually a big fan of this spray too and he's never really commented on any other lavender spay I've used. I will never but another brand of lavender body spry again! Thank you, Asutra!
customer_reviews.author: Val Z.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT smell good
customer_reviews.text: I know aroma is subjectable but this stuff smells awful! I was drawn in by the flowery description of how dreamy it was going to smell and how soothing it would make me feel. It does have a hint of lavender but I can't tell what the rest of the fragrance is.... spray starch? It is really off putting, I tried to convince myself I liked it but just, NO WAY! Please be careful of buying something scent unseen, don't be a fool like I was.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S.

customer_reviews.title: Smells like a fancy Spa!
customer_reviews.text: I was recently house-sitting for a friend, and the guest bedroom I was in smelled so good. I figured out why, after a quick peek into the nightstand. I found a bottle of Asutra Pure Soothing Comfort. My boyfriend REALLY liked it. He kept commenting all weekend on how much he liked it and could I get us a bottle... so I looked on Amazon and sure enough! I just received the order today, and sprayed around the house. I can't wait for him to come home to see how quickly he notices... :)
customer_reviews.author: snowflake33

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Fragrance is very mild....little smell. Certainly does not have lasting power. Used it on my sheets. Sprayed it on and just an extremely lite hint of fragrance which disappears in a minute.
customer_reviews.author: Beachgrammy

customer_reviews.title: Great scent, helps me sleep
customer_reviews.text: Great scent. Was unsure if I wanted chamomile, was originally just looking for lavender, but its a pleasant combination and soothing for sleep. It is mild and I spritz to the right and left of my pillow every night, at least 3-4 squirts each side ("honey close your eyes! Spraying the lavender now!") And the smell lasts long enough until I fall asleep, which for me is a few minutes. I suppose if it would last longer it means it would have less water and more oil base but then I'd have to change my greasy pillow more often so, I'm happy with this product as is. Would buy again, it is now part of my nightly routine!
customer_reviews.author: John Yamada

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed... Naturally
customer_reviews.text: Lately I've been more stressed, depressed, fatigued and overwhelmed than normal. I've been using Eaten need with no relief. This set is amazing!! Each bottle had various essential oils and is labled for your needs. I even mix a couple sometimes. These are great for pillow spray to help calm down at night or squirt on yourself for a quick burst of energy. These really work!! MUST BUY!
customer_reviews.author: T. Marie

customer_reviews.title: Confused by the product
customer_reviews.text: So the picture for this product shows a product in a purple bottle, but all the reviews showed a white bottle which didn’t look as nice as the pictured one. I might have lucked out though because some reviews said the spray in the other bottle wasn’t as good. I’m not sure. This spray is nice but the scent doesn’t last very long. I can smell it immediately after I spray it and it smells nice but 10 minutes later the smell is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle G

customer_reviews.title: 100% love this product
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough good things about this product! I ordered for myself but then my mom ended up in the hospital. When I went to visit her the room smelled liked a hospital....so I brought this spray with me the next time I visited. My mom LOVED it for the air, her hair and pillow for sleeping! 100% recommended and loved by all of us!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Bode

customer_reviews.title: Miracle worker!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I was struggling with insomnia and anxiety and it was driving me crazy. I'm a massage therapist so I am familiar with the effects of lavender. It has allowed me to sleep so much better! My anxiety has also decreased. My husband even enjoys the scent! I have already recommended it to many of my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Schwind

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! I originally came to purchase a different brand, but noticed that this one had way more reviews and higher ratings, so I went out on a limb and bought this instead. So glad I did!! I got twice the product for half the cost and it works like a charm. I'll have to order a few more bottles because it is helping my 4 year old stay fall asleep quickly. *Mom hack alert* She thinks it's pillow perfume (which it is), but I get to have my glass or 2 or 10 of wine earlier than expected. Everybody wins. Thank you guys for this product, the great cusotmer service, and for shipping so fast :)
customer_reviews.author: alicia arant

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE this spray
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this spray. I originally came across it after my boss received a sample with her order of yoga mats and we both thought it was great, maybe even more exciting than the yoga mats. When she was starting to run out, I ordered some for the office because it just wasn't the same without that great smell. I burn incense at home and it's like having an instant incense aroma without any of the mess. I'm very excited to have my bottle for work and I'm absolutely going to order at least one for the car and one for home. There isn't anyone I wouldn't recommend this to.
customer_reviews.author: Devon Rofidal

customer_reviews.title: Love the Patchouli & Bergamot spray for my sheets!
customer_reviews.text: Love this scent. I actually spray this on my sheets along with the Lavender & Chamomile scent I purchased . It lasts all night and helps me to sleep well. Also wanted to note that Asutra’s customer service really goes out of their way to take care of any issues you may run into. I’m a happy customer and will buy from them again. Thanks so much.
customer_reviews.author: Mishmosh97

customer_reviews.title: Citrus & Eucalyptus is the best scent!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered the Citrus & Eucalyptus Mist several times and like it a lot as a body splash/mist! The Rosemary & Peppermint Mist has a very strong scent and will definitely unclog your sinuses....but it's not a smell I want to experience repeatedly all day long. The Lemongrass & Jasmine smells like "soap." Old-fashioned soap. I have not tried the other scents because I'm very happy with the Citrus and don't want to experience another soapy scent.
customer_reviews.author: L. M. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Consistent Scent with Lavender
customer_reviews.text: Bought this twice- once a few years ago and now again recently. Quality is consistent and the scent (lavender) is the same. I have seen the comments that the scent doesn’t last too long; this is probably true but I think that’s because it is a more natural product and doesn’t contain the phthalates that artificial room scents do to help the scent last longer. Product lasts a long time and I would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't cover up odors, removes them
customer_reviews.text: This product works amazingly. We use it in the bathroom. Other products seem to cover the bad smell with another smell, so you can still smell the stinkyness. But when you spray this product, it seems to remove the bad smell and replaces it with a very pleasant scent. I highly recommend it and will order it ongoing.
customer_reviews.author: Lupo

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Honestly after trying different solutions to help me and fight my insomnia and stress I bought this thinking it would be one of those products where people write wonderfuls and don’t work at the end but I’m so happy this product wasn’t a scam at all! Literally I spray all over my bed side and works wonderful helping me to sleep more than 6 hours that for me it’s a win! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mariaant

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like the OG
customer_reviews.text: The bottle changed and so did the formula. When the spray was in a white bottle with brown lettering, the scent was heavenly. The patchouli and bergamot spray helped me sleep better than anything else. When I ordered the recent bottle, the label was colorful and the scent was so unpleasant and very different. I had to return the spray because it was not the product that I loved.
customer_reviews.author: C Tremont

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this aromatherapy mist!!!!! Absolutely love it!!!!!! So uplifting to the Spirit and stress-relieving!!!!! Would not hesitate to purchase it again!!!!!!! The Bergamot essential oil used in it is lovely!!!!! I would recommend this mist to anyone.hands down!!!!!!!!! Really really nice!!!!!!!!! Thanking you soooooo much for creating this beautiful aromatic mist!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ammi

customer_reviews.title: We love the lavender spray
customer_reviews.text: We love the lavender spray! My 11 year old granddaughter spends weekends with us at times. I gave her another lavedar spray last year and she would bring it with her on our weekends as she loves to spray it on her pillow. I bought two so she could have one here and at home. She likes it better than the previous one she used, so I’m sure we will be buying more in the future! We appreciate the great customer service too! They sent me an email with helpful hints and they are very friendly. Highly recommend Asutra!!
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: ... usual spray (Bath and Body Works) and am so happy I did
customer_reviews.text: I decided to give the ASUTRA product a try because it is less expensive than my usual spray (Bath and Body Works) and am so happy I did! We are in the process of buying a house- super stressful- and as soon as I spray it I am instantly soothed. Yes, it may be a placebo effect, but I don't care :). I breathe in deep, love the smell, and feel calmer. I am really excited to learn that it is a small-woman-owned business. I'm ordering a second bottle for my sister in law right now!
customer_reviews.author: SarahB

customer_reviews.title: Smells AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the smell of this product. I’m am not a huge fan of lavender, so I was concerned I would hate it. It is quite the opposite. I spray it on my pillows and my chest before bed each night. It helps to calm any anxiety I have going on from the day. I highly recommend this, and I will be trying some of their other items.
customer_reviews.author: Malissa C. Watkins

customer_reviews.title: If you like the smell of Coppertone...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on prime day, because I love the smell of jasmine and lemongrass. I don’t smell any lemongrass in this, and it sprays on very sweet, very strong for Jasmine. After it sets on your skin though, it smells like I just put on a Coppertone. Not necessarily aromatherapy for me, but I would wear this if I was going to the beach as a scent.
customer_reviews.author: Inkabatinka

customer_reviews.title: ... is the 2nd time I bought this as I loved the first bottle I got
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd time I bought this as I loved the first bottle I got. But the smell is completely different now (can't smell any lavender at all). Disappointed that the same product turned out so different.
customer_reviews.author: alli

customer_reviews.title: Smells like lemon cleaning product with no jasmine sweetness at all
customer_reviews.text: This does not smell anything like jasmine nor lemongrass. It smells like a regular febreeze/chemical cleaning product scent, the sort of strong artificial lemon smell with absolutely no sweetness. I would never spray this on my body. Returning immediately
customer_reviews.author: Anna A

customer_reviews.title: Nice smelling and trustworthy ingredients compared to pharmacy brands
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these! I use them instead of perfume or body spray, also use one of them (lavender scented one) to help fall asleep when I’m a little restless... the scent doesn’t last ALL work day, but almost- and usually the people I work with in the mornings notice how nice it smells :) I will continue to buy the 6 pack as it provides lots of nice smelling options for lots of purposes.
customer_reviews.author: K.D.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and calming...
customer_reviews.text: I am an olfactory gal, and this product is such a soothing, relaxing linen and anywhere spray. I have purchased twice and will continue to be a fan. Looking forward to trying other scent combos in product line. I do wish the lavender notes were a bit more prominent. I spray pillows as I make beds in the morning, the scent lingers in the rooms for most of the day, pleasantly not overpowering. Then the pillows are heavenly to sink into at night! Following directions, no oil spots or stains noted. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Two in VA

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING.....
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. So many lavender scents are overwhelming but Pure Soothing Comfort is perfect!! I was looking for a pillow/sheet spray and after reading reviews before I purchased this particular brand, I decided to try it on my clothing as well. It's a nice mild scent and would make a great perfume. I will definitely buy again and take a look at other scents that Asutra offers.
customer_reviews.author: Carol H.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Smell
customer_reviews.text: I ha r to say this has the worst smell. I love lavender but this spray is horrible. Going to stick with another brand, Bath and Body Works brand is much better
customer_reviews.author: CMac

customer_reviews.title: This stuff smells really good
customer_reviews.text: I’m really weird about “hippie” scents. I hate most essential oils and the standard patchouli smell most “natural” air fresheners have. This spray smells really good though, it always makes the house feel a bit more fresh. The smell doesn’t last for long though, usually just a few hours, which is my biggest issue with it.
customer_reviews.author: SebrinaL

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! At first I wasn't too sure about the smell, but it quickly grew on me and as the others have said, the smell weakens quickly but still helps me sleep. My only complaint is that the bottle is the exact same as Astura's magnesium oil. I keep both on my nightstand, so I easily mix them up. Great company with many great products.
customer_reviews.author: GirlMomB

customer_reviews.title: as I was very disappointed. The smell is fine enough
customer_reviews.text: I am very surprised how well reviewed this is, as I was very disappointed. The smell is fine enough, but it really only lasts a few seconds after spraying, whether I spray it on my body, pillow, or in the air the smell is gone almost immediately. Perhaps I got a bad bottle, as it seems unreal that it would have so many positive reviews with this lasting power.
customer_reviews.author: Brent L

customer_reviews.title: The scent is awesome, but you can only smell it for a second
customer_reviews.text: I never write bad reviews, but I honestly don't want someone else to waste their money. The scent is amazing, I love the smell of lemongrass. When you spray it, it doesn't mist and fill the room, it squirts and the scent lasts for a second. I gave up on it. Then just today, I tried it again and now nothing comes out and it's a full bottle. It 's clogged. Very disappointing for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cook

customer_reviews.title: they change ther formula
customer_reviews.text: They changed the formula with the new label.... too bad...I used this product for years, not anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Martin D.

customer_reviews.title: Scent Evaporates Too Quickly
customer_reviews.text: I do like the smell of this product but it evaporates too quickly. The smell is pleasant and comforting. I tried spraying on my pillow and sheets before bed but it does not linger. I spray it on my pajamas so I have the scent for a little while. Product does not harm clothing , bedclothes or pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool room spray
customer_reviews.text: Love how strong this spray is! Usually natura based l air fresheners and sprays are very subtle and hardly noticeable. This actually scents the room for a good amount of time. However, not much comes in the bottle. I’ve onto had it for a week and its 3/4 of the way empty.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Helps with my insomnia
customer_reviews.text: I'm a chronic insomniac, but avoid taking OTC pills which leaves me groggy the next day, other natural remedies I've tried didn't seem to work. Spraying on my pillow right before bed does seem to reduce the stress of my work day and allow me to drift off to sleep quicker. Has a not too overpowering, soap and citrus smell to it.
customer_reviews.author: sea dawg

customer_reviews.title: Part of my night time routine now
customer_reviews.text: Just like the other reviewers, I am very happy with the scent. It lasts long enough to fall asleep into without lingering around for the next day.
customer_reviews.author: zoshyii

customer_reviews.title: I cannot get over this! (in a good way!)
customer_reviews.text: I received a sample of this with an order of the Magnesium Spray, and brought it with me on a trip, figuring I'd try it while sleeping in several different hotels. I have to say - I LOVE THIS SPRAY! It smells beautiful, and is just the right amount strength - strong enough to be noticeable, but light enough to soothe you gently! This definitely helps me fall asleep/calm down, and I love that it is natural & no synthetic fragrance! Also, the customer service is super! I emailed for the Helpful Tips, and was responded to very promptly! This spray will definitely keep going on my Amazon cart!
customer_reviews.author: C. Eklof

customer_reviews.title: Smells great but not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: The scent smells good and citrusy as described but when I received the package the spray bottle was damaged, the nozzle would not spray the liquid properly I had to find an empty bottle to replace it. The scent doesnt last for very long. The item is too pricey for what I got. Will not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Little goes a long way to help create a calming experience
customer_reviews.text: Lasts very long. Creates a spa like calmness in guestrooms. A little goes a long way. One spritz is all you need so very economical.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Aromatherapy Mist!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received The Pure Soothing Comfort spray mist today. The aroma is wonderful and I can't wait to spray it on my bed linens tonight. It might just help with my chronic insomnia or at least relax me. I just sprayed some on like a body mist and it is heavenly and like its name, soothing and calming. I just went back to the ASUTRA storefront link on Amazon to check out other products and purchased another bottle of the Pure Soothing Comfort along with two other mists that sounded wonderful. Can't wait to receive and try them.Thank you Barbara Johnson. Your product is amazing. I know I will continue to be a repeat customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Ann Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful smell 💕
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this spray. The smell of lavender is refreshing and strong but not overpowering. I delivered my baby girl two weeks ago and I find no time to relax during the day but I spray it on my shirt to relax me for short naps till the baby wakes. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mai N.B

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, Calming Scent
customer_reviews.text: I am so very pleased with this aromatherapy mist and am thankful I opted to give it a try. Aromatherapy, essential oils, and the like, are really not my thing. It was recommended, in light of some sleep issues that have plagued me for time time, that I look into sleep sprays. Despite my doubts I did some research and settled on trying this one, and I could not be more pleased. This smells amazing and is so relaxing and soothing. Its scent is light and relaxing, not perfume-like at all, and I look forward to using it each night when I head to bed.
customer_reviews.author: QueenAnne

customer_reviews.title: An affordable, well blended, excellent aromatherapy line that will leave you glad you tried it !
customer_reviews.text: I love all the Austra products, however I think the aromatherapy mists are amazing. I have them in my tote, next to my bed, in the kitchen, on my makeup table, in the car and the list goes on. These mists are a wonderful mix of oils that do exactly what they say in their name. “Pure soothing comfort”, I use when I’m feeling a bit anxious sometimes I spray a cotton ball and put it in my bra. The scent lingers yet never over powers. I will continue with this brand and recommend AUSTRA to my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Larose

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and soothing scent
customer_reviews.text: Love the wonderful and soothing scent. This is the second time I've purchased this aroma. I spray a little on my pillows and bed a few minutes before retiring for the night. Many times I'm unable to sleep as my brain never wants to stop thinking. This scent takes the edge of my mind a little giving me a better night rest. It doesn't stop me from thinking all together but does seem to produce more soothing thoughts
customer_reviews.author: Linda Zwiesler

customer_reviews.title: Smells great for 2 seconds then disappears.
customer_reviews.text: Smells great for 2 seconds then disappears. Nice lavender scent but I would like something more long lasting. I like to spray it on my pillow and bedding a night time. By the time I put the bottle back on my nightstand the scent is gone. I wanted to like this but I won't be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect blend
customer_reviews.text: I waited a while to write to make sure my first impression would last. It most certainly did! This scent is absolutely perfect. Some lavender is so light you can barely smell anything and others just don't quite smell right. I have used several types of lavender oils in the diffuser and it may be beneficial but not always great smelling. This spray is not at all over powering. I spray it on myself, my bedding and around my sleeping area. I can smell it as I go to sleep. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: PenJ

customer_reviews.title: smell nice and evokes relaxation
customer_reviews.text: Smells very good. I spray it everywhere it suggests, I even let it get on my face being that the ingredients are all natural, organic and similar to what's in a facial toner (Lavender- a natural antibacterial and antimicrobial, Chamomile, Witch Hazel (alcohol free), Rosemary, Aloe, and Jojoba oil). I mostly use it as a body spray.The sprayer mists so nicely, too! Very broad, fine, even mist. At night it is nice, I can't say it puts me to sleep (I take melatonin for sleep), but it does smell nice and evokes relaxation. I also like the story of this small boutique shop, "Made In USA" woman owned company. I would recommend and buy again. Thank you Asutra!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells soured
customer_reviews.text: My friend had this spray and I loved it. It smelled amazing, so I ordered a bottle for myself. The bottle I received has a soured smell to it, kind of like when my essential oils sit in a diffuser too long. It isn’t overpowering, the scent itself is rather light, but every time I spray it, it just has this weird smell to it. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: smells devine........
customer_reviews.text: My second purchase of Asutra and I just love this product. I have the Energy and the Confidence one. They smell amazing. It doesn't last very long so I'm constantly spraying it around. It's a little pricey for what it is and I wished it lingered about longer but I really like it and will definitely get it again. I use it in my car and in my home and I also spray it on my clothes and hair. I love the citrus scent of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Cirel

customer_reviews.title: Easier to ease my mind to sleep
customer_reviews.text: I bought this months ago as a pillow spray to calm me enough to fall asleep. Some nights I find my mind wandering and racing about thoughts about my day and it is too stressful to fall asleep. When I use the spray, I find it easier to turn my brain off and drift off to sleep easier. I find the spray to be pretty strong so a few spritz will do, but the smell does not linger for hours so I'm not waking up in the middle of the night sick of the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan OShea

customer_reviews.title: So I bought it and I LOVE it! It makes me feel happy
customer_reviews.text: I first smelled this when the nurse in the hospital caring for me came in. My heart rate instantly went down. I asked what she was wearing & she was telling me a lot of the nursing staff wears it cause the patients calm down. So I bought it and I LOVE it! It makes me feel happy. :) Awesome stuff!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: smells horrible
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a refreshing spray with aromatherapy qualities.....however I do not like the scent at all. It does not smell good. I love bergamot but this doesn't even smell like it. Maybe the patchouli too musky. I'm disappointed. I can't even use it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love Them
customer_reviews.text: I love this collection. It was exactly what I was looking for, which was a room/body spray with essential oils. I was planning on buying only focus, but when I saw the whole collection I upgraded and am happy that I did. I would also be very much interested in a roll on of the same scents that I could put in a small purse. I use these for aromatherapy and would love to be able to take them with me everywhere I go.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help with my energy levels. I have some health problems that really cause me fatigue. As soon as my eyes start feeling heavy, I spray some on my chest & within 10 minutes I'm feeling more awake. It's the only thing I've found that actually works that well to give me a boost of energy. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL RELAXING SCENT
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product such a relaxing scent and packaged very well except upon trying to open the plastic RIP tab the cap unscrewed and approx 1/4-1/2 bottle poured out :( Highly recommend for the scent :) Received PROMPT reply from ASUTRA and they are mailing a replacement due to packaging leak. BEST CSR help
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl1962

customer_reviews.title: A Clean Reboot
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great product. My husband bought it for me as a gift and I was surprised that he picked out a "beauty" product I actually was impressed with. I've been using it as a face spray and it feels energizing and fresh. Because its not a flowery fragrance, my husband likes using it too. We both appreciate the clean ingredients and how it gives the face and mind a perk up throughout the day. I'll be looking into Asutra's other sprays and definitely recommending this one! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Diller

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good !
customer_reviews.text: This spray is literally a gift from God . Lol my boyfriend bought me this and I’ve been using it every since. I ran out of one bottle and ordered 3 more ! It’s universal and all natural so you can use for almost anything . I use mine as a toner and body mist.
customer_reviews.author: Briani

customer_reviews.title: Very relaxing and pleasant scent.
customer_reviews.text: I am a light sleeper and wanted to find something that would relax me without giving me a headache like other scents. This one is perfect. It's not meant to be flowery; rather, it is to bring a relaxing sensation to the body, which is what I set out to do. It lasts a long time. I can still smell it on my pillow the following morning. Pte: I spray it in the air about 2 feet above my pillow; then I allow it to dry before going to bed.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Strong smell, but it works great!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really does work well for relaxing you and getting you to sleep. I spray once or twice on our pillows, and even on my son's favorite stuffed toy, and it really does help. The smell is a bit strong, but you get used to it. At first, my oldest son didn't really like it, but now he insists on it.
customer_reviews.author: N & J

customer_reviews.title: I Love this SO MUCH!♡♡♡♡♡
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this mist SO much!!!!♡♡♡♡♡ It's exactly what I was searching for, the scent is AMAZING!!! Thank you for making this available, it's a beautiful clean aromatic fragrant spray, with the essential oils perfection recipe to spray when needed! The folks I've shown it to, they sprayed it, Totally loved it as well!!♡ This is perfect!! Loving it daily!!♡♡♡
customer_reviews.author: Rebes

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I have always used the bath and body works pillow spray, when I ran out I decided to look for something that wasn't as pricey. I came across this and I absolutely love it!! It smells fantastic! Doesn't take much, and it dries quickly (which is a big deal for me considering I drench my pillow right before I lay down). I also spray this all over my sheets and comforter. My kids love it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Beamer1

customer_reviews.title: What a great scent! I have had it for only a ...
customer_reviews.text: What a great scent! I have had it for only a few days but found I came back to my desk area and sprayed some on before going to bed-that's how great it smells! The product was packaged with care and arrive very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Budnbutafli43

customer_reviews.title: Great product and Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this mist! It has the perfect smell to fall asleep. It’s not a store bought chemical mix but a wonderful lavender smell that is the real thing—all natural ingredients. I had a question about the product and got a quick response from the owner—I’d say that’s great customer service. I’m very happy with this mist over other brands I’ve gotten in the past.
customer_reviews.author: C. R.

customer_reviews.title: A Great Aromatherapy Mist
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying the Aromatherapy Mist as the aroma is wonderfully pleasing and it definitely relaxes me. I spray my pillow and clothes after dinner and the evening is a dream. Sleep is much more natural and I can get in at least six hours of sleep now. Highly recommend this product! Also really enjoy the tips the owners send on how to use the product to get maximum benefit.
customer_reviews.author: vest man

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Nice scent, however fades pretty quickly compared to others I have tried. Of course if you are more sensitive to smells than me that can be a different experience for you. All natural so can't really complain!
customer_reviews.author: Robbie G

customer_reviews.title: Great concentration, really works!
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and really soothes the soul. I got really into a relaxing pillow spray via a more expensive brand and fell in love with some Astura products. This is fantastic! It works great as a room spray and a pillow spray. The other night, my dog started hearing fireworks, which make her shake violently for hours after. I sprayed this in the bedroom and snuggled her - she was able to relax a lot more and not shake nearly as bad. I might start a spray in my toddlers' rooms before bed now too!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith P

customer_reviews.title: I don't understand the good reviews for this product
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand the good reviews for this product. It does not smell good, it has a weird smell. I was so excited for this spray from all the reviews and was so disappointed. Ick!
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Only smells of peppermint
customer_reviews.text: Only smells of peppermint no other scent comes through, just smells like I'm spraying candy cane flavor everywhere. Got both the peppermint one and the juniper tea tree one and they just smell the same .
customer_reviews.author: Javed

customer_reviews.title: It is wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: I found this product almost by accident, but since it included Jasmine and I remembered living in LA and the intense aroma of Jasmine, I decided to try it. I have been thrilled with this purchase. I spray it daily and it lifts my spirits. It is wonderful !!
customer_reviews.author: JaneGeorge

customer_reviews.title: smells nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice scent but doesn't really help with relaxation. But I must confess I am using it in my office at work. Maybe nothing will ease the tension there.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Helps me sleep
customer_reviews.text: I sleep like a baby when I spray this at night.
customer_reviews.author: C. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Aromatherapy Mist
customer_reviews.text: This is not my favorite mist. I like to keep a mist in my nightstand if I'm having trouble sleeping. The smell is a bit heavy and it's not initially restful to me (for lavender). It does fade and gets better. I may try another one but this will last me some time.
customer_reviews.author: Debra L Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Great company but product did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: Great company; very invested in their product, but unfortunately this particular spray does not work for me. The lavender is pretty heavy and spraying a small amount gave me a headache. As a supporter of small businesses who do things right, I truly appreciate their commitment to their customers as well as their product so will not be returning this but instead passing along.
customer_reviews.author: R.M.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great smell
customer_reviews.text: Received my bottle of aromatherapy last night. I immediately sprayed it in the air and the smell is awesome. I sprayed it on my pillow right before I went to bed. Also, after getting back from exercising I took my shower and sprayed it on myself- I just love the smell very relaxing. Will definitely purchase again. Update: Still enjoy this aromatherapy spray. I have sleeping issues and i serious Lay believe this has assisted me in my sleep. I have been using this for almost a year and never go to bed without it.
customer_reviews.author: Runningleo

customer_reviews.title: Smells fabulous, sprayed it in my 2-year-olds toddler bed ...
customer_reviews.text: Smells fabulous, sprayed it in my 2-year-olds toddler bed and both nights she didn't hop out right away for her usual bedtime delay dance. 👍🏻👍🏻 She stayed put and went straight to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Martin

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful calming scent!
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful product that smells terrific! I use it throughout the day in my home but particularly in my bedroom at night. A calming and soothing scent which helps me fall asleep faster. I have also sprayed it and walked through the mist. People have commented on how good I smell 😊
customer_reviews.author: Denise M Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service – they took the time to e-mail ...
customer_reviews.text: A very high quality product sold by a very caring boutique. Excellent customer service – they took the time to e-mail “How to use” instructions and inquire if I had received the product and how I liked it. The product is very high quality and the price is great – do purchase the assortment pack – it is less expensive and you get to sample all the luscious fragrances. The packaging of the six bottle assortment is nice enough to give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: LYN

customer_reviews.title: Pure Relaxation
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Australia for creating the perfect misting spray! I spritz my pillow before bed and it has truly helps me relax. The bottle sprays ina perfect light mist and doesn’t stain or mark the bedding. The smell reminds me of a high end spa.
customer_reviews.author: chicon91

product_meta.title: ASUTRA Patchouli & Bergamot Essential Oil Blend, Aromatherapy Spray, 4 fl oz | for Face, Body, Rooms, Linens | Relieves Stress & Anxiety | Breathe Easy & Melt Tension Away
feature_bullets: RELIEVE YOUR STRESS: Patchouli and bergamot offer a spicy, earthy, citrusy scent. Patchouli helps you wind down. Bergamot helps relieve anxiety giving you the ability to breathe easy again. When combined these herbs can help melt away tension.
ALL NATURAL: Awaken your senses and boost your mood. This aromatherapy mist contains distilled water and a blend of all-natural essential oils that helps you reboot your day.

NON-TOXIC AND ECO-FRIENDLY: All Asutra mists are made in the USA with love and formulated with non-toxic and eco-friendly ingredients that act as gentle and effective skin toners, providing regenerating and hydrating benefits for fragile skin.

NOT TESTED ON ANIMALS: You can use this aromatherapy spray as a room and body mist, spritzing around the face, the body, and even your linens. It is safe to use on people and pets and has never been tested on any animal.
100% MONEY BACK 30-DAY GURANTEE: You get a convenient 4 oz. bottle, so now whenever you need a boost, just spritz this around you and start feeling revived - 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed.
